title: Quickcast Bug [Gameplay]
body: My quickcast abilities have not been working properly for the last few days. For some reason when i hold down the ability key, it waits until i let go of the key to cast the ability, i was playing taliyah and i would press w and the ability would not go off until i let go of the key, so i missed almost every w by a mile. Is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: Taliyah's W is just a weird ability.  I've mostly gotten used to it now, but it works differently from every other ability in the game for some reason.

NEVERMIND IM AN IDIOT theres an option in the menu that says "replace quickcast with ability indicator" and i had it clicked on
im sorry.
